topic.title: Ghostwatch (banned BBC mockumentary)
topic.body:
This is a mockumentary made and broadcast by the BBC. Anyone who lived through Halloween 1992 in Britain will likely remember the hysteria caused by all the people who ended up believing it was real.

Note: I'll try to personally seed this every evening, but since I'm at university, weekday mornings are off the table. You may experience reduced service during those times.

1_12QQaQ1chJidAhZ55obTFWFxW9eiR6Y8NC.body: My Webtorrent's been off and on showing "1 peer" but no actual seeding. Odd. Could my being on a college dormitory's Wi-FI have something to do with it?
My Transmission can't seem to seed here either. Crap.

> [artemiscrystal](#comment_2_12QQaQ1chJidAhZ55obTFWFxW9eiR6Y8NC): My Transmission can't seem to seed here either. Crap.

"Here" being this Wi-FI, that is.
I'd forward the port, but it's not my network to modify. Is there a way to bypass this?

> [kopykate](#comment_19_16w7UuJAHbt8YBa8zxHS7UFk9mq8Q5DpE4): Alright... I just swapped the magnet link. Works now. :)
> Just download this magnet link if you wish the seed, you can delete the old torrents from WebTorrent now.

Thank you!
